description: This table extracts the related multiple response Blood Special Requirements - Audit Trail (I EPT 18017) item, which stores the audit trail of blood special requirements for the patient. It contains the current values as well as all previous values for this patient.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated instance of editing blood special requirements in the patient's record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of multiple edited pieces of information associated with the patient and the editing instance.

columns.name: BLOOD_SPECIAL_REQTS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores all previously recorded values for special requirements that should be applied to blood orders for this patient


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Irradiated


CMV Negative


Leukoreduced


Sickle Cell (Hgb S) Negative


Concentrate


HLA Match


Solid-Phase Red-Cell Adherence


PLA-1 Negative


Cryoreduced


Washed


PAS


Plasma Compatible
